Mailing Address: c/o City of Kelowna, Revenue Branch1435 Water StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1J4
Service Details: - Offers a discounted transit pass program for businesses and workplaces- Employees sign up for a minimum of four months by payroll deduction, and discounted monthly passes are mailed directly to the employer- Businesses or workplaces are eligible for a 10-15% discount on transit passes when three or more employees sign up- Workplaces sign up at least 15 days before start of a pass period:  Sep 1, Jan 1 or May 1, and the participating employees will receive four months of passes
Eligibility: - Three or more employees are required to sign up for ProPass- Please visit our webpage and download or read the Service Agreement, Order Form and Terms and Conditions
How to Apply: Please visit our web site and download the Enrolment Application
Cost: Cost varies with number of employees enrolled
